en: "Let me kill Moses and let him call upon his Lord.
Indeed, I fear that he will change your religion

ar: أَوْ أَن يُظْهِرَ فِى الْأَرْضِ الْفَسَادَ
en: or that he will cause corruption in the land."
"Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord
"Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord

ar: مِّن كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
en: from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Account."
